mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from V_SALES_LIST where NICK='${nick}'
select IMG from MEMBER where nick='${nick}'
select mem_num from MEMBER where nick='${nick}'

select writer, starScore, CONTENT from ( select m.NICK writer, s.STAR starScore, r.CONTENT, row_number() over(order by r.input_date desc) rnum from GOODS g, MEMBER m, STAR_RATE s, REVIEW r where r.goods_num=s.goods_num and s.mem_num=r.mem_num and r.mem_num=m.mem_num and g.goods_num=r.goods_num and g.MEM_NUM_SELL=#{num} and s.delete_flag='N' and r.delete_flag='N' ) where rnum between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
select s.STAR starScore from GOODS g, MEMBER m, STAR_RATE s where s.goods_num=g.goods_num and g.mem_num_sell=m.mem_num and m.nick='${nick}' and s.delete_flag='N'
